data.title: Good non-chain gelato in charming location
data.text: Stopped in for dessert while visiting in Kansas City. We prefer non-chain restaurants and will go out of our way for good food. The gelato was creamy and the flavors were great and plentiful. We'd go there again.

data.title: Way too expensive
data.text:
Well, I've heard about Aunt Jean's for years and finally decided to give it a try.  It's a really small location, easy to find right on Johnson Drive just a couple of doors down from City Hall.

The ups:  There is a big variety of hand-made ice cream, gelatos and sorbets.  Unusual flavors are all hand-made in small batches.

The BIG down:  Price.  I guess you are paying for those small hand-made batches, but $4.50+ for two scoops in a plastic cup is ridiculous.  You can also purchase a quart for $11.50+ which is 100% absurd.

So I guess for a special date night with your sweetie or to try some unusual flavors that really did sound kinda good, then this is your place.    I know it is probably heracy, but I still prefer DQ.

data.title: overrated
data.text: this place has great gelato but it is far too expensive for what it is. you are better off going to dairy queen for a blizzard.

data.title: I scream, you scream, we all scream for Ice Cream
data.text: ice Cream on a hot evening. What could be better.  Family friendly... Right in the neighborhood of downtown shawnee,Ks.

data.title: Nothing like gelato
data.text: If you don't know the difference between ice cream and gelato, here's the place to find out.  Fabulous !!  With some tables and chairs outside for a nice day to savor the sweetness and watch the world go by.  Even Italian sodas for sale. A little pricey but worth it.

data.title: Great place!
data.text: I love all of the homemade gelato! Definitely worth stopping in. I had the blue angel. I also tried birthday cake and cappuccino. All very good!

data.title: Simply the Best Gelato in Shawnee
data.text:
the title says it all.  Many flavors to choose from.  Nice selection of soft drinks, some Italian.  Very friendly owners and staff.
The coffee and coffee drinks are worth stopping in for as well.

data.title: Great even during winter!
data.text: Always something new and different. I won't go anywhere else when I need dessert, and that's a lot! I always like all the chocolate choices while my boyfriend prefers all the sweet options. They allow you to taste test all you want until you find what hits that sweet tooth. Thanks Aunt Jean!
